title: Some Recent Sign Designs
content:
Here are some sign designs that I created. :)

-Charles Borges de Oliveira

author: Charles_borges_...

comments.content:
Are they serving chili peppers at the Alabama State Fair?

Nice work Chuck : )

Michael
Well done! I particularly like the "State Fair" one.
These are great. Have they been produced yet? If so, how were they created, and do you have pictures?

Thanks Jos and Jonathan!

These are just fictional sign designs that I made for my new font "Shocard Rodeo" All of the lettering on the signs are mine ;)

-Charles
